content:
hutiji? ne :) hutiji samo posiljajo take simpl drone nad savdijske
rafinerije. vcasih kaksen pride skozi, veliko jih ne.

ravnokar je bila izjava:

SAUDI ARABIA SAYS ABSOLVES ITSELF OF ANY RESPONSIBILITY OF SHORTAGE
OF OIL SUPPLY IN LIGHT OF RECENT ATTACKS BY HOUTHIS - STATE NEWS
AGENCY

... podnapisi : halo dejte ze poslat te patriote

in povezano:

OIL INDUSTRY EXECUTIVES INVITED TO WHITE HOUSE ON MONDAY -SOURCES

ceprav dandanes miljarda spet ni nek denar:)
